Please read below for our international student workshops, or click here for workshops on world travel.              International Student Workshops          The OGS offers the following online workshops for students (workshops include audio).                           Post-Completion OPT Workshop                                                              Learn more about post-completion optional practical training, which allows up to 12 months of employment authorization. Watch the whole playlist on Youtube here .                            Pre-Completion OPT Workshop                                                              View this workshop to learn more about F-1 pre completion optional practical training. Watch the whole workshop playlist here .                            CPT Workshop                                                              Learn how you, as an F-1 student, can accept paid, off-campus employment that is integral to your degree program's curriculum. Watch the whole playlist here.                              Travel Workshop                                                              This workshop is designed to inform international students of the requirements for traveling outside of and returning to the U.S. in valid F-1 or J-1 student status. Watch the entire playlist here .                            Looking for another Workshop?                  Visit the World Travel workshops if you are traveling to another location.              Get an F-1 or J-1 Visa                       Entering the U.S                       Mandatory Check-in                       Arrival Checklist                       Required Health Insurance Coverage                       International Student Fees                       How to Update Your Local U.S. Address                       Estimated Expenses                       Transfer to NYU                       Change of Status to F-1 or J-1                                                                   Mandatory Check-in         All new international students* must attend a mandatory check-in workshop with the OGS as   soon as possible once you arrive to the United States.   Note that failure to attend a check-in workshop may jeopardize your ability to remain legally in the U.S.   * J-1 students sponsored by other organizations (such as Fulbright) and   * dependents of F-1 and J-1 students do NOT need to attend.            When:   There are no further check-in workshops for the Spring 2015 semester. If you have not yet checked in, you must go to the OGS walk-in advising hours (Monday-Thursday, 1:00 p.m. - 4:00 p.m.) as soon as possible with the documents as listed below.   Students arriving for the Summer and Fall 2015 terms, check-in workshops will be posted here, once scheduled.          What to bring:     Passport   I-94 record   I-20 or DS-2019   Your dependent’s documents (if you have dependents)          Remember:     Before attending the check-in workshop, update your U.S. address with NYU.     You will not be admitted to the check-in without bringing ALL of your required documents.     Workshops last approximately 1 hour.   Arrive at least 15 minutes early   Latecomers are not admitted.
